item.title: In a warming world, freshwater production is moving deep beneath the sea
item.description: Climate change is driving a global boom in desalination as regions turn to the sea for drinking water

item.title: Just 198,000 Americans filed jobless claims last week, fewer than expected
item.description: Fewer Americans applied for unemployment benefits last week as U.S. layoffs remain low despite growing concern about a weakening job market

item.title: Senators launch a cross-party effort to end stock trading by lawmakers
item.description: Senators from opposing parties are working together in hopes of finally banning members of Congress from trading stocks
